eduversum.name: OpenOffice.org Calc (Spreadsheet)
eduversum.description: Calc the spreadsheet editor of OpenOffice.org: With Calc you can analyse, sum up and present your data. Diagrams and tools help evaluate the transparency of your numbers. A fully integrated help-system makes inputing complex formulas easier. Add external data using the data-pilot, sort and filter it, create subtotals and statistical analysis. Use the preview to find the suitable representation out of 13 categories of 2-D and 3-D graphics including line-, surface-, bar-, pie-, XY- and net-charts with dozens of variations.
